title: Fort Frederica National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 25, 2016  Centennial Festival  The National Park Service at Fort Frederica National Monument is pleased to announce the details of the Centennial Living History Festival on Saturday, August 27, 2016, 10am to 4pm. This event commemorates the centennial anniversary of the National Park Service.
